channel.title: Comments on: New Old Job
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: By: monica
item.dc:creator: monica
item.description: :) I love the way you put that at the end there... amazing what magical thought brings you to.I am convinced that we are blessed, and that the world is a much stranger, more elastic, and much more wonderful place than many assume.Glad to hear that the rope you wove was long enough to hold you until the ship came!!!
